mapper.sql: ID, OddsID, UpOdds, Goal, DownOdds, type, addTime
mapper.select: select * from multitotalscorehalf l,multitotalscorehalfdetail d where l.OddsID = d.OddsID and l.ScheduleID = #{mid} and CompanyID = #{cpy} and num = #{num} order by id desc limit 1
mapper.insert:

ID,

UpOdds,

DownOdds,
type,
addTime,

mapper.update:
update multitotalscorehalfdetail
OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL},
Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL},
DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
addTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update multitotalscorehalfdetail set OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
